Home » 13S4 Saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 9 Asaṅkhatasaṃyutta » 9.2 Dutiyavagga » 9.2.1 Asaṅkhatasutta
9.2.1.2 Vipassanā
Asaṅkhatasaṃyutta
Dutiyavagga
Asaṅkhatasutta
Vipassanā
1697Asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaṅkhatagāmiñca maggaṃ. Taṃ suṇātha. Katamañca, bhikkhave, asaṅkhataṃ? Yo, bhikkhave, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—  idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhataṃ. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo? Vipassanā. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo. Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṃ vo mayā asaṅkhataṃ…pe…  ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanīti. (1.2)
